chapter.title: About
chapter.para: db2xhtml Library is a XSLT+CSS library set for rendering DocBook XML file(s) to XHTML at browser side.
Current target DocBook implementation is version 4.4.
Library has been tested with Mozilla Firefox 3.6.12 and Google Chrome 7.0.517.44.

warning.para: Current DocBook implementation is far from complete.
